official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands, withdrawn by the Bureau of Reclamation for townsite purposes, to the Huntley Project Irrigation District, Ballantine, Montana.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to the Huntley Irrigation District, Montana, for public park and recreational purposes. Declares that nothing in this Act affects the ownership of minerals located under such lands.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands, withdrawn by the Bureau of Reclamation for townsite purposes, to the Huntley Project Irrigation District, Ballantine, Montana.
